original_title: Roots That Reach Toward The Sky
overview: When her mother’s Chinese Traditional Medicine shop gets vandalized, Kai, a young botanist and heir of her mothers ancestral practice is pushed to the edge of what her mental health can handle. Thrust in the middle of her immigrant mother’s grief and her muralist partner’s resistant hope, Kai must decide what is most important to her.
title: Roots That Reach Toward The Sky
